cons: Too much vitamin E in your body can trigger an overdose situation, causing lethargy, blurred vision, headaches, diarrhea and flatulence.
Eating too many almonds can actually cause constipation and abdominal bloating if your body is not used to processing large amounts of fiber.
description: Almonds are high in healthy monounsaturated fats, fiber, protein and various important nutrients.
Almonds are high in antioxidants that can protect your cells from oxidative damage, a major contributor to ageing and disease.
Almonds are among the world's best sources of vitamin E.
Nuts are low in carbs, but high in protein and fiber.
